channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2B/RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment update notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 23, 09:30 - 15:30 UTC

Sep 5, 23:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 23/09/2024 09:30 UTC
End time : 23/09/2024 15:30 UTC
Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 16, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 20, 15:00 UTC

Aug 30, 22:37 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/09/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/09/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Backup as a Service] - Veeam Enterprise incident notification
item.description:
Sep 5, 15:04 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are working on the fix which will be implemented in the coming weeks.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Sep 5, 12:53 UTC
Identified - Start time : 04/09/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers who upgrade their Veeam servers to the latest version, won't be able to connect to our Veeam Enterprise, but they will be protected by the current license.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are preparing a fix to solve the issue.
